title: B Ramp Rendezvous for Early Round or Post Plant
description: This Rendezvous can be used when pushing aggressively into B Main, or for post plant on the side of B.

title: Mid Doors Trademark + Rendezvous Variations
description: This Trademark gives your team vital information when enemy players attempt to lurk or push through Mid Doors. This gives you the flexibility to play passive or aggressive in and around Mid Doors, and Art.

title: B Site Hold Off Angle Rendezvous
description: Here's an off angle Rendezvous setup that you can use a couple of times through the Defending half to catch enemy players off guard.

title: Aggressive A Main Rendezvous from A Lobby
description: Use this Rendezvous to aggressively peek into A Main.

title: C Site + Waterfall Teleport from C Main
description: Here is a potentially high risk C Main Rendezvous Setup that allows you to hold off angles inside of C Site, or push into Waterfall. Use this to expand your options, but don't force a play into Waterfall without enough information.

title: A Tree Exec / Post Plant Rendezvous
description: Use this Rendezvous both when executing onto A Site, and when holding down the site post plant.

title: B Main Lurk Trademark + Rendezvous Setup
description: Use this simple, but effective B Main lurk setup when your team is pushing toward A.

title: A Main Boosted Rendezvous Angle
description: Boost yourself on top of the Tall box that sits inside of the the A Main Spawn barrier, and then use your teleport to escape from that angle after taking a shot at a player peeking into A Main. Though, be careful of utility like Raze's Paint Shells, or Breach's Aftershock being used pre-emptively on angle that Defenders commonly play near where your Rendezvous is set up after you get on top of the Tall Box.

title: C Main to C Waterfall Teleport Setup to Hold Deep C Main Angle
description: Use this simple, but effective Rendezvous to hold a deep angle into C Main, and then either safely escape after taking a shot / gathering information or quickly rotate toward the other Sites once given information from elsewhere on the map.

title: A Top Off Angle Teleport from A Stairs
description: Use this A Top off angle Teleport from A Stairs to passively hold / gather information in A Main, and then hold an unexpected angle into A Site after teleporting - once you believe enemy players could have taken space in A Main or A Site. Use this as a reactive setup to enemy players not showing much presence on the side of A Site throughout the half, or enemy players hard hitting A Site consistently.

title: Back C Platform Entry Fast Lane + C Site Relay Bolts
description: Here's a great entry Fast Lane for back C Platform, alongside two great Relay bolts to stun commonly held positions on C Site.

title: Right Side A Site Entry Relay Bolt + Fast Lane Setup
description: Here's a great entry Relay Bolt + Fast Lane setup, that is centered around the usage of your Relay Bolt(s) as you push out onto Site.

title: B Site Entry Fast Lane
description: Here's a great entry Fast Lane for B Site.

title: Full Utility B Site Site Hold / Delay Setup
description: Here's a great full utility Site Hold for B Site, that effectively delays the attackers pushing out onto Site.

title: A Site Retake Fast Lane to Clear under Heaven
description: Here's a great Retake Fast Lane that breaks up some of the common crossfires on A Site, making it much easier for you and your team to push into Site and clear under Heaven when retaking A Site.

title: C Garage High Gear Jiggle Peek
description: Here's an effective, but sometimes risky way to gather information on players peeking into Grass at the beginning of the round. Try not to use this too much throughout a match however, since players will start to counter this the more often you do it throughout the Defending half.

title: Early Round Relay Bolt to Push up A Ramp
description: Here's a simple, but effective Relay Bolt that can be used to push up A Ramp at the beginning of the round from A Main. Just be careful of enemy players holding the A Main cross / pushing into A Main as you push up the ramp.

title: A Site Post Plant Relay Bolt from A Heaven
description: Here's an effective way to use your Relay Bolt in a post plant scenario on A Site.

title: Full Utility B Site Hold / Delay Setup from A Heaven
description: Here's a great full utility Site Hold for B Site from B Heaven, that effectively delays the Attackers push out onto Site. You can also use this from under Heaven, but that is much more risky.

title: A Main to B Stairs + Close Left Lever Relay Bolt
description: Here's a great Relay Bolt that stuns two commonly held areas on Site.

title: A Main to A Dice + Close Right Bricks Relay Bolt
description: Here's a great Relay Bolt that stuns two commonly held areas on Site.

title: B Site Retake Fast Lane
description: Here's a great Fast Lane to retake control of the spike plant area on B Site.

title: A Main Delay Setup From Tree
description: Here's a great full utility delay setup for A Site.

title: A Rafters Retake Fast Lane for A Site
description: Here's a great retake Fast Lane that you can use to take back space on A Site, or Defend A Site, from A Rafters. This wall can give you a lot of flexibility in how you retake A Site with your team, or create an opportunity for you and your team to make it very difficult for the enemy team to take space on site.

title: A Rafters Slide on Top of Dice to Peek Under Heaven
description: Here's a great way to catch players under Heaven off guard, if you can find the right timing to do so.

title: Early Round A Belt High Gear Jump from Four Ten
description: Here's a great way to jump onto A Belt from Four Ten at the very beginning of the round using your High Gear ability.

title: Front B Site Spike Plant Delay / Retake Fast Lane
description: Here's a great way to use your Fast Lane to delay, or do damage to the enemy Spike Planter on B Site.

title: A Pyramids Retake / Delay Fast Lane + Relay Bolt Setup
description: Here's a great retake / delay Fast Lane + Relay Bolt setup, that allows you to aggressively retake control of the left side of the A Pyramids.

title: Back B Site Retake Fast Lane From Defender Spawn
description: Here's a great Fast Lane + Relay Bolt retake setup for B Site from Defender Spawn, that allows you to insert yourself into Back B Site.

title: B Site Fast Lane + Relay Bolt Delay Setup
description: Here's a great Fast Lane + Relay Bolt delay setup from B Tunnel.

title: A Drop Support Fast Lane for A Site
description: Here's a great late lurk support Fast Lane for A Site, that allows your teammates to push out onto A Site, if your controller player has already used their utility to sell a fake push onto B Site earlier into the round.

title: B Site Entry Setup From B Main
description: Here's a great entry setup for B Site from B Main.

title: A Main Fast Lane + Relay Bolt Delay Setup
description: Here's a great Fast Lane + Relay Bolt delay setup for A Site.

title: B Main Fast Lane + Relay Bolt Delay Setup
description: Here's a great Fast Lane + Relay Bolt delay setup for B Site.

title: Execute Relay Bolt for Back A Site
description: Here's a simple, but effective Relay Bolt for Back A Site, that is typically the most useful while executing onto A Site.

title: Fast Lane Spike Timing Outplay + Retake Stuns
description: Here are two great Retake stuns for A Site, alongside a way to catch the enemy team off guard while they are planting the Spike on A Site.
